pwalk(
  .l = appshots_parameters[1:52, ], 
  .f = function(app_name, vwidth, vheight, selector, cliprect) {
    if (
      !file.exists(here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))) | 
        file.mtime(here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))) < 
        max(ref, file.mtime(here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name))))
    ) {
      if (!is.na(selector)) {
        return(
          appshot(
            app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
            delay = 2,
            vwidth = vwidth,
            # vheight = vheight,
            selector = selector,
            # cliprect = cliprect,
            envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
            file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
          )
        )
      }
      if (!is.na(cliprect)) {
        return(
          appshot(
            app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
            delay = 2,
            vwidth = vwidth,
            vheight = vheight,
            # selector = selector,
            cliprect = cliprect,
            envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
            file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
          )
        )
      }
      appshot(
        app = here("materials", sprintf("%s-app/app.R", app_name)), 
        delay = 2,
        vwidth = vwidth,
        vheight = vheight,
        # selector = selector,
        # cliprect = cliprect,
        envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
        file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
      )
    }
  }
)

pwalk(

        cliprect = cliprect,
        envvars = c(display.mode = "normal"),
        file = here("images", sprintf("%s.png", app_name))
      )
    }
  }
)
